# Test that the main output file respects different routes functions

# Generate with default routes function
muxt generate --output-multiple-files

exists index_template_routes_gen.go
exists template_routes.go
grep 'func TemplateRoutes' template_routes.go

# Regenerate with same routes function - should update files, not create new ones
muxt generate --output-multiple-files

exists index_template_routes_gen.go
exists template_routes.go
exists template.go
exists main.go

-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.24
-- template.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed *.gohtml
var source embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(source, "*.gohtml"))
-- index.gohtml --
{{define "GET / Home()"}}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<body>
  <h1>Index</h1>
</body>
</html>
{{end}}
-- main.go --
package main

func main() {}

type Server struct{}

func (s *Server) Home() any {
	return nil
}
